attributes.title: github_issues_comments_help
attributes.visState:
{"title":"github_issues_comments_help","type":"markdown","params":{"fontSize":12,"markdown":"#### GitHub Issues Comments and Collaboration

* **Number of issue comments** gives an idea of the activity at different levels, from Project to individuals.
* **Collaboration Network** shows people as nodes. Node size is the number of issues they created. Edges link people commenting on the same issue thread. Edge size represents the number of comments.
* **Tables** offer a view of the comments activity split by project, repository, and individual, allowing to compare among them.

**Note**: ratios are calculated as specific count (`+1` or `all reactions`) divided by total count (`issues + comments`).

[See complete dashboard documentation](https://chaoss.github.io/grimoirelab-sigils/panels/github-issues-comments-and-collaboration/)"},"aggs":[]}
